Html:
When is the latest 'production' release to be available for general consumption which includes all the new goodies I've seen in the source.

I know I can download the latest source code and do my own compile, but I don't want to take that course of action.

Thanks.

@thebohonk,

I think the best way is using nuget package.

If need more help on how get started take a look here

Thanks

Yeah, thanks, but, I'm already at 1.0.3.
I want the 'next' latest - 1.0.4 ?? the new stuff I've seen in the current source code that is on this site.
OK got it. There is no 1.04 pre-compiled option, you'll need to compile from source.
A new release is coming soon.
